  • Method Details

    • forceEmpty

      Query<T> forceEmpty()
      When calling select() or getProcessor() on this query, returns a processor that returns no results. Use with care.

      NOTE: The query will be executed if used as a sub-query.

      Example usages: 1. we don't want to return any results for security reasons 2. we want to short-circuit when we know the query will return no results such as when comparing whether a non-nullable column has a null value.

      Returns:
      the this ptr

    • addHint

      ISelectQueryBuilder<T> addHint(QueryHint hint)
      Add a QueryHint to use for this query
      Parameters:
      hint - The hint to use
      Returns:
      this
